tasks.title: Implement Payment Method Selection UI
tasks.description: Create the UI for choosing between different payment methods (VA, QRIS, E-Wallet, Retail, Card).
tasks.details: Display icons and labels for all supported payment methods provided by Xendit as listed in PRD-Payment.md. Ensure proper layout and responsiveness.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all payment methods are visible and clickable, leading to their respective simulation views.

tasks.title: Develop Virtual Account Simulation
tasks.description: Simulate the Virtual Account payment flow for multiple banks.
tasks.details: Create views for BCA, BNI, BRI, Mandiri, Permata, and CIMB Niaga. Display dummy VA numbers, total payment, and simulation buttons (Success/Failed).
tasks.testStrategy: Test bank selection and verify that dummy VA numbers and simulation buttons are displayed correctly.

tasks.title: Develop QRIS Simulation
tasks.description: Simulate the QRIS payment flow with a static QR code.
tasks.details: Display a static QR code image, an optional countdown timer (visual only), and buttons for 'I've Paid' (Success) and 'Cancel'.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the QR code is displayed and the 'I've Paid' button triggers the success state.

tasks.title: Develop E-Wallet Simulation
tasks.description: Simulate payment flows for GoPay, OVO, DANA, ShopeePay, and LinkAja.
tasks.details: Display logos for each e-wallet, instructions for opening the respective app, and simulation buttons (Success/Failed).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all e-wallet options display the correct logos and trigger simulation states.

tasks.title: Develop Retail Outlet Simulation
tasks.description: Simulate payment flows for Alfamart and Indomaret.
tasks.details: Display payment codes, instructions for over-the-counter payment, and buttons for 'Simulate Paid' and 'Cancel'.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that retail outlet views display dummy codes and correctly handle simulation actions.

tasks.title: Develop Credit/Debit Card Simulation
tasks.description: Simulate the credit/debit card payment interface.
tasks.details: Create input fields for card number (masked), expiry date, and CVV. Include 'Pay Now' (Success) and 'Fail Payment' buttons.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that input fields exist and buttons correctly simulate the payment outcomes.

tasks.title: Implement Payment Success and Failure States
tasks.description: Handle the outcomes of all payment simulations.
tasks.details: On success, display a success message and booking confirmation with a barcode. On failure, display an error message and options to retry or choose another method.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all simulation buttons across all methods lead to either the success or failure state as intended.
